name: Tootuff's World
overview: Titeuf is back with the first game for the Nintendo DS. This time to capture the heart of his girlfriend Nadia. Characteristics: - 40 mini games. - Optimum utilization of the DS applications. - The pen: Copy the signature of your parents on your report as well as possible - The mirco: Blow up balloons for Zizie by blowing in the micro or become the fart king. - Double screen: potato puree battles - Various Modes: Adventure mode, Direct Access mode, Multiboot mode 4 players
